sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../../components/ui/Card'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; import { Users, Briefcase, GraduationCap, MessageSquare, Plus, TrendingUp, Clock, CheckCircle, } from 'lucide-react'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); // Mock data - replace with actual API calls const stats = { totalApplicants: 1247, totalJobs: 89, totalScholarships: 156, pendingApplications: 23, recentApplications: 12, activeChats: 8, }; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, type: 'application', user: 'John Doe', action: 'submitted application for', target: 'Software Engineer at Google', time: '2 minutes ago', }, { id: 2, type: 'scholarship', user: 'Jane Smith', action: 'applied for', target: 'Harvard MBA Scholarship', time: '15 minutes ago', }, { id: 3, type: 'chat', user: 'Mike Johnson', action: 'sent a message', target: '', time: '1 hour ago', }, ]; const quickActions = [ { title: 'Add New Job', description: 'Create a new job posting', icon: Briefcase, href: '/admin/jobs', color: 'bg-blue-500', }, { title: 'Add Scholarship', description: 'Create a new scholarship opportunity', icon: GraduationCap, href: '/admin/scholarships', color: 'bg-green-500', }, { title: 'Manage Applicants', description: 'View and manage applicant profiles', icon: Users, href: '/admin/applicants', color: 'bg-purple-500', }, { title: 'View Messages', description: 'Check recent chat messages', icon: MessageSquare, href: '/admin/chat', color: 'bg-orange-500', }, ]; const getRoleTitle = () => { switch (user?.role) { case 'admin': return 'Administrator'; case 'staff': return 'Staff Member'; default: return 'User'; } }; return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.first_name}!

Here's what's happening with your {getRoleTitle().toLowerCase()} dashboard today.

{/* Stats Cards */}
Total Applicants
{stats.totalApplicants.toLocaleString()}
Active Jobs
{stats.totalJobs}
Scholarships
{stats.totalScholarships}
Pending Applications
{stats.pendingApplications}
Recent Applications
{stats.recentApplications}
Active Chats
{stats.activeChats}
{/* Quick Actions */} Quick Actions
{quickActions.map((action) => { const Icon = action.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Recent Activity */} Recent Activity
    {recentActivity.map((activity, activityIdx) => (
  • {activityIdx !== recentActivity.length - 1 ? ( ) : null}
    {activity.type === 'application' && ( )} {activity.type === 'scholarship' && ( )} {activity.type === 'chat' && ( )}

    {activity.user} {' '} {activity.action}{' '} {activity.target && ( {activity.target} )}

    {activity.time}
    • ))}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
